fields.headline: PDA's Newsbucket
fields.bodyText: Bebo 'definitely' bought for $1bn A deal happened on Monday, says source. Source: TechCrunch Imeem acquires Snocap Digital music wholesaler Snocap, long searching for a buyer, is being acquired by music streaming site Imeem. Source: TechCrunch Officials step up net-neutrality efforts Big broadband companies are headed for a clash with Washington over plans to prioritise web traffic. Source: Wall Street Journal Loic Le Meur raises $6 million for videomail startup Seesmic scores in the Valley. Source: Valleywag Yahoo and News Corp in talks amid Microsoft bid Yahoo hasn't abandoned hope of finding a way to keep Microsoft bid at bay. Source: Wall Street Journal VentureBeat raises $320,000 seed round Industry blog claims record traffic. Source: VentureBeat Getting fired at Yahoo - a Twitter log Yahoo's Ryan Kuder twittered being sacked. Source: Silicon Alley Insider Bradley Horowitz leaves Yahoo for Google First key executive to leave. Source: TechCrunch Via Del.icio.us
